main_screen:search_button.name: main_screen:search_button
main_screen:search_button.description: Button to open the search functionality.
main_screen:search_button.effect: tap to open the search functionality within the main_screen, displaying an input field for entering search queries and buttons for navigating search results.

main_screen:open_note_button.name: main_screen:open_note_button
main_screen:open_note_button.description: Button to open an existing note.
main_screen:open_note_button.effect: tap to navigate to the open_note_dialog, which is a dialog window for opening a note. It includes a title, a scrollable list with options to open a 'Diary' note or a 'General note', each represented by a checkbox. The 'Diary' option is currently selected. There is also an option to create a new note, represented by a checkbox.

main_screen:new_note_button.name: main_screen:new_note_button
main_screen:new_note_button.description: Button to create a new note.
main_screen:new_note_button.effect: tap to navigate to the add_new_note_dialog, which is a dialog window for adding a new note. It includes a title, an input field for user input, options for selecting the type of note (text note or checklist), and buttons for canceling or confirming the action.
main_screen:new_note_button.element:
<button alt="Create a new note" id="10" resource_id="new_note">
</button>

main_screen:more_options_button.name: main_screen:more_options_button
main_screen:more_options_button.effect: tap to navigate to the more_options_popup, which is a popup window that includes options including rename note, share, create shortcut, lock note, open file, import notes, export as file, export all notes, print, delete note, settings, and about.

main_screen:diary_tab_button.name: main_screen:diary_tab_button
main_screen:diary_tab_button.description: Button to switch to the Diary tab.
main_screen:diary_tab_button.effect: tap to switch to the Diary tab, displaying a scrollable list of notes, each represented by a text input field. The current note is displayed with a placeholder text indicating that the note is empty.

main_screen:general_note_tab_button.name: main_screen:general_note_tab_button
main_screen:general_note_tab_button.description: Button to switch to the General Note tab.
main_screen:general_note_tab_button.effect: tap to switch to the General Note tab, displaying a scrollable list of notes, each represented by a text input field. The current note is displayed with a placeholder text indicating that the note is empty.

main_screen:notes_list.name: main_screen:notes_list
main_screen:notes_list.description: A scrollable list of notes displayed in the main content area. Each note is represented by a text input field.
main_screen:notes_list.effect: set text to update the note input field within the notes_list.

main_screen:note_input.name: main_screen:note_input
main_screen:note_input.description: Text input field representing an individual note within the notes_list.

main_screen:search_input.name: main_screen:search_input
main_screen:search_input.description: Input field for entering search queries.
main_screen:search_input.effect: set text to update the search input field within the main_screen.

main_screen:search_next_button.description: Button to navigate to the next search result.

main_screen:search_clear_button.name: main_screen:search_clear_button
main_screen:search_clear_button.description: Button to clear the current search query.

more_options_popup:options_list.name: more_options_popup:options_list
more_options_popup:options_list.description: A list of options presented as buttons within a ListView. Each option allows the user to perform a specific action related to notes.
more_options_popup:options_list.effect: tap to navigate to the configure_settings screen, which allows the user to configure various settings. It contains a toolbar with a back button and a title indicating the purpose of the screen. Below the toolbar, there is a scrollable area with sections for text settings, startup options, and saving options. The text settings section includes checkboxes for using a monospaced font, using incognito mode of keyboards, and enabling line wrap. The startup options section includes checkboxes for placing the cursor at the end of the note, showing the keyboard on startup, and showing a note picker on startup. The saving options section includes checkboxes for autosaving notes and displaying save success messages.

export_options_dialog.skeleton:
<framelayout>
 <linearlayout>
  <framelayout>
   <framelayout resource_id="action_bar_root">
    <framelayout resource_id="content">
     <linearlayoutcompat resource_id="parentPanel">
      <framelayout resource_id="customPanel">
       <framelayout resource_id="custom">
        <scrollview resource_id="dialog_radio_holder">
         <radiogroup resource_id="dialog_radio_group">
          <checkbox>
          </checkbox>
         </radiogroup>
        </scrollview>
       </framelayout>
      </framelayout>
     </linearlayoutcompat>
    </framelayout>
   </framelayout>
  </framelayout>
 </linearlayout>
</framelayout>

print_options_screen:destination_button.name: print_options_screen:destination_button
print_options_screen:destination_button.description: Button to select the print destination, currently set to 'Save as PDF'.

print_options_screen:summary_button.name: print_options_screen:summary_button
print_options_screen:summary_button.description: Button displaying a summary of the print options, including the number of copies and paper size.
xpath:
//*[@resource_id='summary_content' and text()='Copies:
1
Paper size:
Letter' and @alt='Summary, copies 1, paper size Letter']
print_options_screen:summary_button.element:
<button alt="Summary, copies 1, paper size Letter" id="13" resource_id="summary_content">
</button>

print_options_screen:preview_content_lis.name: print_options_screen:preview_content_list
print_options_screen:preview_content_lis.description: A list of preview pages for the document to be printed. Each item includes a checkbox to select the page and a footer displaying the page number.

print_options_screen:preview_page_checkb.name: print_options_screen:preview_page_checkbox
print_options_screen:preview_page_checkb.description: Checkbox to select a preview page within the preview_content_list.

print_options_screen:print_button.name: print_options_screen:print_button
print_options_screen:print_button.description: Button to finalize the print action, currently labeled 'Save to PDF'.
print_options_screen:print_button.effect: tap to navigate to the export_file_screen, which allows the user to select the directory to save the exported file. The screen includes a toolbar with navigation options, a breadcrumb navigation showing the current directory, a list of files in the current directory, and input fields for the file name and save button.

print_options_screen:copies_label.name: print_options_screen:copies_label
print_options_screen:copies_label.description: Label for the number of copies in the summary section.

print_options_screen:copies_count_summar.name: print_options_screen:copies_count_summary
print_options_screen:copies_count_summar.description: Displays the number of copies in the summary section.

print_options_screen:paper_size_label.name: print_options_screen:paper_size_label
print_options_screen:paper_size_label.description: Label for the paper size in the summary section.

print_options_screen:paper_size_summary.name: print_options_screen:paper_size_summary
print_options_screen:paper_size_summary.description: Displays the paper size in the summary section.

print_options_screen:embedded_content_sc.name: print_options_screen:embedded_content_scrim
print_options_screen:embedded_content_sc.description: Overlay view for the embedded content container.

print_options_screen:page_content.name: print_options_screen:page_content
print_options_screen:page_content.description: Content view for the preview page within the preview_content_list.

print_options_screen:page_footer.name: print_options_screen:page_footer
print_options_screen:page_footer.description: Footer layout for the preview page within the preview_content_list, containing the page number and selector.

print_options_screen:page_number_checkbo.name: print_options_screen:page_number_checkbox
print_options_screen:page_number_checkbo.description: Checkbox displaying the page number within the page_footer.

print_options_screen:page_selector.name: print_options_screen:page_selector
print_options_screen:page_selector.description: Image view for selecting the preview page within the page_footer.

print_options_screen.skeleton:
<framelayout>
 <linearlayout>
  <framelayout resource_id="content">
   <viewgroup resource_id="options_content">
    <linearlayout resource_id="dynamic_content">
    </linearlayout>
    <framelayout resource_id="static_content">
     <button resource_id="destination_spinner">
      <linearlayout>
       <imageview resource_id="icon">
       </imageview>
       <relativelayout>
        <button resource_id="title">
        </button>
       </relativelayout>
      </linearlayout>
     </button>
    </framelayout>
    <button resource_id="summary_content">
     <button>
     </button>
     <button resource_id="copies_count_summary">
     </button>
     <button resource_id="paper_size_summary">
     </button>
    </button>
    <framelayout resource_id="embedded_content_container">
     <view resource_id="embedded_content_scrim">
     </view>
     <recyclerview resource_id="preview_content">
      <checkbox resource_id="preview_page">
       <view resource_id="page_content">
       </view>
       <relativelayout resource_id="page_footer">
        <checkbox resource_id="page_number">
        </checkbox>
        <imageview resource_id="page_selector">
        </imageview>
       </relativelayout>
      </checkbox>
     </recyclerview>
    </framelayout>
    <button resource_id="print_button">
    </button>
   </viewgroup>
  </framelayout>
 </linearlayout>
</framelayout>

delete_note_dialog:delete_note_descripti.name: delete_note_dialog:delete_note_description
delete_note_dialog:delete_note_descripti.description: A message indicating the purpose of the dialog, asking for confirmation to delete a note.
xpath: //*[@resource_id='delete_note_description' and text()='Are you sure you want to delete note "Diary"?']
delete_note_dialog:delete_note_descripti.element: Are you sure you want to delete note "Diary"?

delete_note_dialog:cancel_button.name: delete_note_dialog:cancel_button
delete_note_dialog:cancel_button.description: A button to cancel the deletion action and close the dialog.
delete_note_dialog:cancel_button.effect: tap to navigate back to the main_screen, which serves as the main interface for the application. It contains a toolbar with buttons for searching, opening a note, creating a new note, and accessing more options. Below the toolbar, there is a tab strip with options for 'Diary' and 'General note'. The main content area displays a scrollable list of notes, each represented by a text input field. The current note is displayed with a placeholder text indicating that the note is empty.

delete_note_dialog:delete_button.name: delete_note_dialog:delete_button
delete_note_dialog:delete_button.description: A button to confirm the deletion of the note.
delete_note_dialog:delete_button.effect: tap to confirm the deletion of the note and navigate back to the main_screen, which serves as the main interface for the application. It contains a toolbar with buttons for searching, opening a note, creating a new note, and accessing more options. Below the toolbar, there is a tab strip with options for 'Diary' and 'General note'. The main content area displays a scrollable list of notes, each represented by a text input field. The current note is displayed with a placeholder text indicating that the note is empty.

configure_settings:back_button.name: configure_settings:back_button
configure_settings:back_button.description: A button in the toolbar for navigating back to the previous screen.
configure_settings:back_button.effect: tap to navigate back to the main_screen, which serves as the main interface for the application. It contains a toolbar with buttons for searching, opening a note, creating a new note, and accessing more options. Below the toolbar, there is a tab strip with options for 'Diary' and 'General note'. The main content area displays a scrollable list of notes, each represented by a text input field. The current note is displayed with a placeholder text indicating that the note is empty.

configure_settings:screen_title.name: configure_settings:screen_title
configure_settings:screen_title.description: A title in the toolbar indicating the purpose of the screen.

configure_settings:settings_scroll_area.name: configure_settings:settings_scroll_area
configure_settings:settings_scroll_area.description: A scrollable area containing various settings sections.
configure_settings:settings_scroll_area.effect: scroll down to reveal more settings options within the scrollable area.
xpath:
//*[@resource_id='settings_nested_scrollview' and text()='COLOR CUSTOMIZATION

Customize colors


Customize widget colors


GENERAL

Font size
100%


TEXT

Show word count


Make links and emails clickable


Use monospaced font


Use Incognito mode of keyboards


Enable line wrap']

configure_settings:color_customization_s.description: A label indicating the color customization section.

configure_settings:color_customization_o.name: configure_settings:color_customization_options
configure_settings:color_customization_o.description: A list of buttons for customizing colors and widget colors.
configure_settings:color_customization_o.effect: tap to navigate to the customize_colors_screen, which allows the user to customize various color settings including theme, text color, background color, primary color, and app icon color.

configure_settings:general_settings_labe.name: configure_settings:general_settings_label
configure_settings:general_settings_labe.description: A label indicating the general settings section.

configure_settings:font_size_options.effect: tap to navigate to the font_size_selection_dialog, which is a dialog window that includes options for selecting various font sizes.

configure_settings:text_settings_options.name: configure_settings:text_settings_options

configure_settings:text_settings_options.effect: tap to toggle the display of word count in the text settings section.

configure_settings:customize_colors_butt.name: configure_settings:customize_colors_button
configure_settings:customize_colors_butt.description: A button for customizing colors in the color customization section.
configure_settings:customize_colors_butt.effect: tap to navigate to the customize_colors_screen, which allows the user to customize various color settings including theme, text color, background color, primary color, and app icon color.

configure_settings:widget_color_customiz.name: configure_settings:widget_color_customization_options
configure_settings:widget_color_customiz.description: A list of buttons for customizing widget colors.

configure_settings:customize_widget_colo.name: configure_settings:customize_widget_colors_button
configure_settings:customize_widget_colo.description: A button for customizing widget colors in the widget color customization section.

customize_colors_screen:customization_te.description: An image representing the current text color setting.

customize_colors_screen:customization_ap.description: An image representing the current app icon color setting.

customize_colors_screen:save_button.name: customize_colors_screen:save_button
customize_colors_screen:save_button.description: A button to save the customized color settings.
customize_colors_screen:save_button.effect: tap to save the customized color settings and navigate back to the previous screen.

theme_warning_dialog:warning_message.name: theme_warning_dialog:warning_message
theme_warning_dialog:warning_message.description: Displays a warning message indicating that some launchers do not handle app icon customization properly.
xpath: //*[@resource_id='message' and text()='WARNING: Some launchers do not handle app icon cus']
theme_warning_dialog:warning_message.element: WARNING: Some launchers do not handle app icon cus

theme_warning_dialog:ok_button.name: theme_warning_dialog:ok_button
theme_warning_dialog:ok_button.description: Button to acknowledge the warning message and proceed.
theme_warning_dialog:ok_button.effect: tap to navigate to the theme_selection_dialog, which is a dialog window for selecting a theme. It contains a scrollable area with a radio group that includes checkboxes for various theme options.

theme_selection_dialog:theme_options.name: theme_selection_dialog:theme_options
theme_selection_dialog:theme_options.description: A scrollable radio group containing checkboxes for various theme options. The options include 'Auto light / dark', 'Light', 'Dark', 'Dark red', 'White', 'Black & White', and 'Custom'. The 'Dark' option is currently selected.
theme_selection_dialog:theme_options.effect: tap to navigate to the customize_colors_screen, which allows the user to customize various color settings. It contains a toolbar with a back button and a title indicating the purpose of the screen. Below the toolbar, there is a scrollable area with sections for theme, text color, background color, primary color, and app icon color. Each section includes buttons for selecting the respective color options. There is also a save button at the top right corner.
xpath:
//*[@resource_id='dialog_radio_group' and text()='Auto light / dark
Light
Dark
Dark red
White
Black & White
Custom']

scrollable_settings_screen:line_wrap_che.description: Checkbox to enable or disable line wrapping.
scrollable_settings_screen:line_wrap_che.element:
<checkbox id="33" resource_id="settings_enable_line_wrap" status="selected">
 Enable line wrap
</checkbox>

scrollable_settings_screen:alignment_val.name: scrollable_settings_screen:alignment_value_button
scrollable_settings_screen:alignment_val.description: Button to display the current text alignment setting.

scrollable_settings_screen:text_divider.name: scrollable_settings_screen:text_divider
scrollable_settings_screen:text_divider.description: Divider image separating the text settings section from the startup options section.

scrollable_settings_screen:startup_label.name: scrollable_settings_screen:startup_label
scrollable_settings_screen:startup_label.description: Label indicating the start of the startup options section.

scrollable_settings_screen:cursor_placem.name: scrollable_settings_screen:cursor_placement_checkbox
scrollable_settings_screen:cursor_placem.description: Checkbox to enable or disable placing the cursor at the end of the note on startup.
xpath: //*[@resource_id='settings_cursor_placement' and text()='Place cursor to the end of note']
scrollable_settings_screen:cursor_placem.element:
<checkbox id="40" resource_id="settings_cursor_placement" status="selected">
 Place cursor to the end of note
</checkbox>

scrollable_settings_screen:show_keyboard.name: scrollable_settings_screen:show_keyboard_checkbox
scrollable_settings_screen:show_keyboard.description: Checkbox to enable or disable showing the keyboard on startup.
scrollable_settings_screen:show_keyboard.element:
<checkbox id="42" resource_id="settings_show_keyboard" status="selected">
 Show keyboard on startup
</checkbox>

scrollable_settings_screen:note_picker_c.name: scrollable_settings_screen:note_picker_checkbox
scrollable_settings_screen:note_picker_c.description: Checkbox to enable or disable showing a note picker on startup.
xpath: //*[@resource_id='settings_show_note_picker' and text()='Show a note picker on startup']
scrollable_settings_screen:note_picker_c.element:
<checkbox id="44" resource_id="settings_show_note_picker">
 Show a note picker on startup
</checkbox>

scrollable_settings_screen:startup_divid.name: scrollable_settings_screen:startup_divider
scrollable_settings_screen:startup_divid.description: Divider image separating the startup options section from the saving options section.

scrollable_settings_screen:saving_label.name: scrollable_settings_screen:saving_label
scrollable_settings_screen:saving_label.description: Label indicating the start of the saving options section.

scrollable_settings_screen:autosave_note.name: scrollable_settings_screen:autosave_notes_checkbox
scrollable_settings_screen:autosave_note.description: Checkbox to enable or disable autosaving notes.

scrollable_settings_screen:display_succe.name: scrollable_settings_screen:display_success_checkbox
scrollable_settings_screen:display_succe.description: Checkbox to enable or disable displaying save success messages.
scrollable_settings_screen:display_succe.element:
<checkbox id="50" resource_id="settings_display_success">
 Display save success messages
</checkbox>

options: Place cursor to the end of note
Show a note picker on startup
scrollable_settings_screen:settings_sect.name: scrollable_settings_screen:settings_sections_list
scrollable_settings_screen:settings_sect.description: A list of settings sections presented as RelativeLayouts within the scrollable area. Each section contains checkboxes for various settings options.

alignment_selection_dialog:alignment_opt.name: alignment_selection_dialog:alignment_options
alignment_selection_dialog:alignment_opt.description: A radio group containing checkboxes for selecting text alignment options. The options include 'Left', 'Center', and 'Right'.
alignment_selection_dialog:alignment_opt.effect: tap to select the 'Center' alignment option in the alignment_selection_dialog.

alignment_selection_dialog.skeleton:
<framelayout>
 <linearlayout>
  <framelayout>
   <framelayout resource_id="action_bar_root">
    <framelayout resource_id="content">
     <linearlayoutcompat resource_id="parentPanel">
      <framelayout resource_id="customPanel">
       <framelayout resource_id="custom">
        <scrollview resource_id="dialog_radio_holder">
         <radiogroup resource_id="dialog_radio_group">
          <checkbox>
          </checkbox>
         </radiogroup>
        </scrollview>
       </framelayout>
      </framelayout>
     </linearlayoutcompat>
    </framelayout>
   </framelayout>
  </framelayout>
 </linearlayout>
</framelayout>

sort_by_dialog:dialog_title.name: sort_by_dialog:dialog_title
sort_by_dialog:dialog_title.description: The title of the dialog indicating the purpose of the dialog.

sort_by_dialog:sorting_options.name: sort_by_dialog:sorting_options
sort_by_dialog:sorting_options.description: A radio group containing checkboxes for sorting options including Title, Date created, and Custom.
sort_by_dialog:sorting_options.effect: tap to select the 'Date created' sorting option in the sort_by_dialog.

sort_by_dialog:order_options.name: sort_by_dialog:order_options
sort_by_dialog:order_options.description: A radio group containing checkboxes for sorting order including Ascending and Descending.

sort_by_dialog:move_done_checklist_items.name: sort_by_dialog:move_done_checklist_items
sort_by_dialog:move_done_checklist_items.description: A checkbox for moving done checklist items to the bottom.
xpath: //*[@resource_id='settings_move_undone_checklist_items' and text()='Move done checklist items to the bottom']
sort_by_dialog:move_done_checklist_items.element:
<checkbox id="21" resource_id="settings_move_undone_checklist_items">
 Move done checklist items to the bottom
</checkbox>

sort_by_dialog:cancel_button.name: sort_by_dialog:cancel_button
sort_by_dialog:cancel_button.description: Button to cancel the action and close the dialog.

sort_by_dialog:confirm_button.name: sort_by_dialog:confirm_button
sort_by_dialog:confirm_button.description: Button to confirm the action and apply the selected sorting options.
sort_by_dialog:confirm_button.effect: tap to confirm the action and apply the selected sorting options.

font_size_selection_dialog:font_size_opt.name: font_size_selection_dialog:font_size_options
font_size_selection_dialog:font_size_opt.description: A scrollable radio group containing checkboxes for various font size options. The options include 50%, 60%, 75%, 90%, 100%, 125%, 150%, 175%, 200%, 250%, and 300%. The '100%' option is currently selected.
font_size_selection_dialog:font_size_opt.effect: tap to select the '125%' font size option. The dialog will update to reflect the new font size selection.

font_size_selection_dialog.skeleton:
<framelayout>
 <linearlayout>
  <framelayout>
   <framelayout resource_id="action_bar_root">
    <framelayout resource_id="content">
     <linearlayoutcompat resource_id="parentPanel">
      <framelayout resource_id="customPanel">
       <framelayout resource_id="custom">
        <scrollview resource_id="dialog_radio_holder">
         <radiogroup resource_id="dialog_radio_group">
          <checkbox>
          </checkbox>
         </radiogroup>
        </scrollview>
       </framelayout>
      </framelayout>
     </linearlayoutcompat>
    </framelayout>
   </framelayout>
  </framelayout>
 </linearlayout>
</framelayout>
